mapper.delete: delete from selected where amuse_id = #{amuse_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select:
SELECT s.amuse_id, am.a_name, am.a_country, am.a_time, ai.url FROM selected AS s INNER JOIN amusement AS am INNER JOIN aimage AS ai ON s.amuse_id = am.amuse_id AND am.amuse_id = ai.amuse_id WHERE s.member_id = #{member_id}
and am.a_name like CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
and am.a_country = '대한민국' and am.a_country != '대한민국'
GROUP BY s.amuse_id
ORDER BY am.a_opening DESC ORDER BY am.a_view DESC
ORDER BY am.amuse_id DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{end}
